casebody.data:
Frank E. POLO, Appellant(s)/Petitioner(s),
v.
Merlin HERNANDEZ, Appellee(s)/Respondent(s), CASE NO.: 3D17-2526 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. NOVEMBER 28, 2017 SALTER, EMAS and LOGUE, JJ., concur.

Following review of the petition for writ of certiorari, it is ordered that said petition is hereby denied.
